channel.title: I'm Mateusz (Posts about XAML)
channel.description: Markup language used for declarative UI programming in Windows Presentation Foundation.

item.title: Phinite
item.dc:creator: Mateusz Bysiek
item.description:
Phinite is a windows desktop application that implements an approximate solution to a language theory problem. The task was to create a deterministic finite-state machine that is equivalent to a given regular expression.

Read moreâ€¦ (1 min remaining to read)
